Omnisynth Framework Documentation¶

Introduction¶

Omnisynth is a framework for creating and playing custom synth patches. This framework is a wrapper around the popoular audio programming language, Supercollider. This is made possible through Open Sound Control communication between Python and Supercollider. The Omnisynth framework allows complete control with a GUI and headless commands to the audio server. Any midi controller should work “plug-and-play” and usb audio interfaces are also supported.
